string-array.name: device_descriptions
string-array.item: A smart dog cam is a device that lets you monitor and interact with your pet remotely, using your phone.
A smart doorbell is a device that alerts you when someone rings it, and lets you see and talk to the visitor using your phone.

A smart fridge is a device that connects to the internet and offers various features, such as displaying recipes, ordering groceries, playing music, or showing whatâ€™s inside without opening the door.
A smart assistant is a device that uses artificial intelligence to answer your questions, control other smart devices, play music, set reminders, or perform other tasks using voice commands.
A smart lawn mower is a device that can cut your grass automatically, using sensors and GPS to navigate your yard.
A smart light bulb is a device that can change its brightness, color, or schedule using your phone or voice commands.
A smart thermostat is a device that can adjust the temperature of your home automatically, using sensors and algorithms to learn your preferences.
A smart vacuum is a device that can clean your floors automatically, using sensors and cameras to avoid obstacles and map your home.
A smart outdoor camera is a device that can capture high-quality photos and videos, and also perform various functions using artificial intelligence.
